AUTO_WELCOME_BACK.name: Auto welcome back
AUTO_WELCOME_BACK.tooltip: Automatically says wb when someone comes back from being afk or joins synergy

AUTO_WELCOME.name: Auto welcome
AUTO_WELCOME.tooltip: Automatically says welcome! when a new person joins synergy

WB_FILTER.name: Auto wb filter
WB_FILTER.tooltip: A switch between no filter, a whitelist filter, and a blacklist

WB_WHITELIST.name: Auto welcome back whitelist
WB_WHITELIST.tooltip: The list of names to say wb to when using auto wb, separated by a space

WB_BLACKLIST.name: Auto welcome back blacklist
WB_BLACKLIST.tooltip: The list of names to ignore people when using auto wb, separated by a space

WB_MESSAGE.name: Welcome back message
WB_MESSAGE.tooltip: What message auto welcome back should say

WELCOME_MESSAGE.state: Whalecum Tew SinRG! Do /cr then /p auto to get a plot or do /kms to get admin rank!
WELCOME_MESSAGE.name: Welcome message
WELCOME_MESSAGE.tooltip: What message auto welcome should say

WB_DELAY.name: Auto welcome back delay
WB_DELAY.tooltip: How long the bot should wait before saying wb after someone joins in GAME TICKS

WB_COOLDOWN.name: Auto welcome back cooldown
WB_COOLDOWN.tooltip: The cooldown between the bot saying wb in seconds
